DOC.brief_summary: The investigator conduct nationally representative survey chest physician Egypt 2016-2017 . Self-administered questionnaire use assess physician ' knowledge lung cancer screen guideline , belief effectiveness screen test , order screen chest radiography , low-dose spiral compute tomography , sputum cytology past 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: Audit Lung Cancer Screening Practice Chest Physicians : An Update
DOC.detailed_description: Although current practice guideline recommend screen asymptomatic patient lung cancer , physician may still order lung cancer screen test . No recent national survey health care professional focus lung cancer screen
DOC.criteria: Physicians practise Egypt ( Chest physician , general practitioner , general internist ) Other nationality Other speciality
